name: Transcendent
description:
This game is an fps shooter.

You will spawn with a random weapon in your hand and several randomly generated enemies will come to attack you, run from them and kill them.

Your weapon will change to a random weapon after a short period of time.

If your enemy is low on health and is not in your field of view, it will regenerate its health.

use WASD or arrow keys to move, left control to sprint and spacebar to jump.

Press "P" key during the game to pause the game.

get as much kills as you can and have fun!!
